content.rendered:
• Dual Pump (Peristaltic & Venturi)
  • For Anterior & Posterior Segment surgery
  • Minimal Stress Technology
  • Single use I/A cassette available
  • Dynamic IOP control system
  • Dual liner foot pedal
  • Vitrectomy cut rate up-to 10,000 cuts/min
  • Integrated Programmable IV Pole
